mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USER_MILEAGE_VAL), 0) AS TOT FROM USER_MILEAGE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_MILEAGE_ABLE = 1
SELECT * FROM USER_MILEAGE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_MILEAGE_ABLE = 1 ORDER BY USER_MILEAGE_CREATETIME DESC

SELECT UP.USER_PLANT_NO AS USER_PLANT_NO , UP.PLANT_NO AS PLANT_NO , UP.WH_PLANT_NO AS WH_PLANT_NO , UP.USER_PLANT_NM AS PLANT_MN , UP.USER_PLANT_MODIFYTIME AS USER_PLANT_MODIFYTIME , P.PLANT_NM AS PLANT_NM , P.PLANT_CATEGORY AS PLANT_CATEGORY FROM USER_PLANT AS UP INNER JOIN PLANT AS P ON P.PLANT_NO = UP.PLANT_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_PLANT_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY USER_PLANT_CREATETIME DESC

SELECT USER_NOTI_NO AS userNotificationNo , USER_NO AS userNo , WH_PLANT_NO AS warehouseNo , PRODUCT_NO AS productNo , USER_PLANT_NO AS userPlantNo , USER_MILEAGE_NO AS userMileageNo , USER_NOTI_CONTENT AS userNotificationContent , USER_NOTI_TYPE AS userNotificationType , USER_NOTI_ACTIVE AS userNotificationActive , USER_NOTI_CREATETIME AS userNotificationCreatetime , USER_NOTI_READTIME AS userNotificationReadtime , IFNULL(( SELECT USER_PLANT_NM AS userPlantName FROM USER_PLANT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND WH_PLANT_NO = UN.WH_PLANT_NO ) , ( SELECT PLANT_NM AS plantName FROM PLANT WHERE PLANT_NO = (SELECT PLANT_NO FROM USER_PLANT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND WH_PLANT_NO = UN.WH_PLANT_NO) )) AS userPlantName , ( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName FROM PRODUCT AS P WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = UN.PRODUCT_NO ) AS productName FROM USER_NOTI AS UN WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_NOTI_ACTIVE != 2 ORDER BY USER_NOTI_CREATETIME DESC
